Title: Relates to establishing a committee to study the feasibility of funding a kindergarten to college/career ready program and a universal college savings account
Summary: Establishes a committee to study the feasibility of funding a kindergarten to college/career ready program and a universal college savings account.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a committee to study the feasibility of funding a kindergarten to college/career ready program and a universal college savings account; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
